# SDK Releases

## 1.5.0

- Introduces algorithm to timeout connections that are taking too long relative to other connections.

## 1.4.0

- Include the server list in the config section of the report submitted after test completion.

## 1.3.0

- Make reported errors in case of connection timeouts more explicit.

## 1.2.0

- Log console errors in case of connection timeouts.

## 1.1.1

- Fixed CORS errors which sometimes occurred while performing a test against an https server.

## 1.1.0

- Changed API to fetch server list so that it fetches location and ISP data as well.
- The onResultSaved listener now has access to testResults even if saveResults is false.
- Updated the Axios library to avoid a security vulnerability.

## 1.0.9

- Updated to webpack 5; addressed some potential CSP violations.

## 1.0.8

- Fixed intermittent error with reporting server version

## 1.0.7

- Incorrectly pushed build; do not use

## 1.0.6

- Update dependencies (resolve vulnerabilities)
  - direct:
    - qs 6.9.1 -> 6.11.1
  - transitive:
    - call-bind 1.0.2 -> 1.1.1
    - get-intrinsic 1.0.3 -> 1.1.1
    - has-symbols 1.0.1 -> 1.0.3
    - json5 1.0.1 -> 1.0.2
    - lodash-es 4.17.15 -> 4.17.21
    - object-inspect 1.7.0 -> 1.12.3
    - minimist 1.2.5 -> 1.2.8

## 1.0.5

- Fix issue with custom stagesList being set as an empty list
- Update README, LICENSE

## 1.0.0

- Initial release

## 0.9.0

- Initial beta release
